title: AI Translation-Integrated English as a Foreign Language (EFL) Education Strategy Design for Vietnamese Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and comprehension of specialized terminology (medical/legal/technical fields)
context.additional_context: Recognizing the limitations of AI translation tools in a constrained technological environment centered on smartphones and developing practical translation strategies through profession-specific educational simulations.

learning_goals: Learners recognize directional asymmetry issues in AI tools when translating Vietnameseâ†”English and can select context-appropriate translation strategies.
Learners can analyze AI translation errors in kinship terms, idiomatic expressions, and complex sentence structures and propose correction methods.
Learners can compare AI translation tool usage cases by career stage (early/mid/late) and develop educational designs applicable to their specialty.

resources: ChatGPT and Vietnamese-English parallel translation dataset
Casebook of Translation Errors by Specialized Field
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
